Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO HIGHER EDUCATION

Title: Provides that tuition for the state university of New York and the city university of New York shall not be increased for certain academic years
Summary: Provides that tuition for the state university of New York and the city university of New York shall not be increased for certain academic years.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to providing that tuition for the state university of New York and the city university of New York shall not be increased for certain academic years
